resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107341</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107341</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206506</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">After the Day of Infamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nach dem Tag der Niedertracht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Après le jour de l'infamie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Após o dia do infamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dopo il giorno di infamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετά από την ημέρα Infamy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Después del día del infamy</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers 12 hours of interviews recorded in the days and months following the bombing of Pearl Harbor from more than 200 individuals in cities and towns across the U.S. Audio and transcripts of the interviews are provided.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Angebote 12 Stunden Interviews, die an den Tagen 
und an den Monaten der Bombardierung von Pearl Harbor von mehr als 200
Einzelpersonen in den Städte und in den Städten über dem VEREINIGTE
STAATEN Audio und von den Abschriften der Interviews folgend 
gespeichert werden, werden zur Verfügung gestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">des offres 12 heures d'entrevues enregistrées en 
jours et mois suivant le bombardement du port de perle de plus de 200 
individus dans les villes et les villes à travers l'acoustique des 
ETATS-UNIS et de transcriptions des entrevues sont fournies.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">as ofertas 12 horas das entrevistas gravadas nos 
dias e nos meses que seguem o bombardeio do porto de pérola de mais 
de 200 indivíduos nas cidades e nas cidades através do áudio de 
ESTADOS UNIDOS e de transcripts das entrevistas são fornecidas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">le offerte 12 ore delle interviste registrate nei 
giorni e nei mesi che seguono il bombardamento del porto di perla da 
più di 200 individui in città ed in città attraverso l'audio degli 
STATI UNITI e dalle trascrizioni delle interviste sono fornite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσφέρει 12 ώρες των συνεντεύξεων που 
καταγράφονται στις ημέρες και τους μήνες μετά από το βομβαρδισμό
του λιμανιού μαργαριταριών από περισσότερα από 200 άτομα στις
πόλεις και οι κωμοπόλεις πέρα από τον ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΟ ήχο και τα 
αντίγραφα των συνεντεύξεων παρέχονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">se proporcionan las ofertas 12 horas de 
entrevistas registradas en los días y los meses que siguen el 
bombardeo del puerto de perla de más de 200 individuos en ciudades y 
ciudades a través del audio de ESTADOS UNIDOS y de transcripciones de
las entrevistas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206506</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107341</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/after-the-day-of-infamy</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
